channel.title: CVE Feed for HelpU -- HelpuViewer.exe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HelpU -- HelpuViewer.exe

item.title: CVE-2020-7867|2024-08-04T09:41:01.954Z -- helpu -- helpuviewer.exe
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in Helpu solution could allow a local attacker to arbitrary file creation and execution without click file transfer menu. It is possible to file in arbitrary directory for user because the viewer program receive the file from agent with privilege of administrator.
